name: Escape Velocity (Megan Thompson)
description:
A puzzle game designed to be played with no vision, where you use rumble and sound to solve puzzles, and escape the spaceship's engine room. 

You will need a controller with a rumble motor (this was created with an xbox controller but should work with others) and headphones.

This is a prototype created for a University module, hence the short length.

Created using Unreal Engine 5
